name: Crossline (Pitman)
description:
Crossline
Crossline is a puzzle game where you'll have to connect colored lines by dragging them from point to point, with a limited amount of straight/diagonal moves.

This game is made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme for this year was "Joined Together".

Controls:
Tap/click and hold to start drawing a line. Release on an empty point to connect the line.

Notes:
The web version might take a while to load and is best played in fullscreen. It also might not display properly on mobile devices.
